message.content:
cs.LO, cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.PL, cs.CC

The paper deals with simulation games played on automata and transducers, which are topics commonly studied in the areas of logic (cs.LO) and formal languages (cs.FL). The use of buffers in the games also suggests a connection to data structures (cs.DS) and programming languages (cs.PL). Finally, the complexity analysis of the games may also be relevant to the area of computational complexity (cs.CC).
